类型: Size: MediumColor: Navy C Patch Logo
评论详情: Champion may have changed their pattern on these champion jersey pants. The new ones ordered, a size larger then the usual size are tight in the thighs, hips & waist are more like hips huggers and don't go up to the waist. Also, the pockets are shorter & don't fit a smart phone, hanging halfway out, or falling out after sitting down. They feel more like a woman's fit and not a men's. I've been buying these for years & this is 1st time coming across this issue with Champion. The codes on the plastic wrap for each pair are a different code from the 2 that fit properly. Either Amazon picked the wrong pants off their shelves or Champion labeled them wrong or changed their pattern. Needless to say, all but 2 are being sent back to Amazon.
